thebraziltimes.com/2015/04/whose-money-i.title: Whose money is the government spending?
thebraziltimes.com/2015/04/whose-money-i.snippet: The young man sat down across from my desk. He was obviously perturbed about something so while my mind raced through every possible scenario for him coming to my desk, he struggled to speak. I want to know whose money is it, he said. I waited.
